name: GEO SHOT
description:
An exciting top down shooter made in 5 days! Aim and Shot all the evil triangles to win points, and beat your personal Highscore!  CONTROLS:
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • Mouse for aiming
  • Left click for shoot
  • F for fullscreen
  • ESC to exit

Available for Windows Platforms.

PS: This game is just a prototype made for the Billy´s Basement Game Jam, so, it is not  not finished yet.It was a lot of fun of making and I realy hope you like it. And also is my first game jam submission.

Made by : Gil Daniel
